plants.name: 콩슈터
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>-누군가가 "어떻게 작은 식물이 엄청 빠르게 자라고
많은 콩을 쏠 수 있나요?"라는 물음에, 콩슈터는 "힘든
노력과 헌신, 햇빛과 높은 섬유질, 그리고 이산화탄소가
곁들여진 건강하고 균형적인 아침만 있으면
가능하답니다."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>콩슈터는 당신의 첫 번째 방어선입니다.
그들은 좀비에게 콩을 쏴 공격합니다.<color=black>

<color=black>대미지 | 공격 쿨타임: </color><color=#8B0000>20 | 1.5초</color>

plants.name: 해바라기
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>해바라기는 비트를 타는 것을 멈출 수 없습니다.
왜냐고요? 그야 해바라기만이 들을 수 있는
생명력 넘치는 재즈 리듬이 지구에서 나오니까요!</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>해바라기는 태양을 생산하기 위한 중요한 식물입니다! 가능한 최대로 도배해보세요!

<color=black>태양 생산량 | 태양 생산 쿨타임: </color><color=#8B0000>25 | 25초</color></size>

plants.name: 체리 폭탄
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>"나 폭발할래" 체리 #1이 말합니다."아니야,
같이 자폭해 보자!" 그의 형제, 체리 #2가 말합니다.
그들의 열렬한 토의 끝에, 그들은 자폭발하기로
마음먹었습니다.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>체리 폭탄은 범위 내에 있는 모든 좀비를 날려버릴 수
있습니다. 짧은 시간 뒤 폭발하니 좀비 근처에
둬보세요!

<color=black>대미지: </color><color=#8B0000>1800 (즉사 판정)</color>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>중간</color>
<color=black>사용 방법: </color><color=#8B0000>일회용 식물, 즉시 발동</color></size>

plants.name: 호두
plants.introduce:
<size=34><color=black>호두왈 "사람들이 언제나 내가 좀비에게 물리는 느낌이
어떠냐고 물어보지...". 사람들은 호두의 감각이 제한되어
있어 사실은 편안한 등 마사지 같은 따끔거림인지
모릅니다. </color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>호두는 다른 식물을 보호하기 위한 단단한 껍질을
가지고 있습니다.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color></size>

plants.name: 감자 지뢰
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>몇몇 사람들은 감자 지뢰가 게으르며, 모든 일을 끝까지 
룬다고 말하지만, 이에 대해 감자 지뢰는 아무 말도
하지 않습니다. 왜냐면 그는 그의 코인 투자 전략을
생각하기 바쁘거든요.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>감자 지뢰는 강력한 한 방을 가지고 있지만, 준비에
시간이 걸립니다. 좀비 앞에 설치해 좀비와 접촉시켜
폭발시키세요.

<color=black>대미지: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>감자 지뢰가 있는 타일</color>
<color=black>사용 방법: </color><color=#8B0000>일회용 식물, 발동하는데 시간이 필요함</color></size>

plants.name: 먹깨비
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>먹깨비는 작은 공포 컨셉트 가게에서 스턴트 공연을
할 뻔했지만 매니저가 너무 많은 것을 요구해 무산될
뻔했습니다. 하지만 먹깨비는 화를 내지 않고는
"이건 비즈니스의 일부야"라고 넘겼습니다.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>먹깨비는 좀비를 통째로 먹을 수 있지만 좀비를 먹는
동안엔 취약합니다.

<color=black>대미지: </color><color=#8B0000>즉사</color>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>코앞</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>앞 타일에 있는 가장 가까운 좀비를
먹습니다.</color></size>

plants.name: 뻐끔 버섯
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>뻐끔 버섯은 "전 최근에야 좀비의 좀비를 알게
되었어요."라고 합니다. "많은 균류 친구들처럼 저도
좀비가 동화에서만 나오는 괴물인지 알았죠. 하지만
아니었던거에요! 이건 정말 말도 안된다고요!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>뻐끔 버섯은 싼 가격을 가지고 있지만 공격 사거리가
짧습니다.

<color=black>대미지 | 공격 쿨타임: </color><color=#8B0000>20 | 1.5초</color>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>짧음</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>세 번까지 중첩이 가능합니다.</color></size>

<size=30><color=#2b0057>낮 스테이지에선 필요 태양이 증가합니다!</color></size>

plants.name: 가스 버섯
plants.introduce:
<size=34><color=black>"난 이스트 포자를 만드는 빵공장에서 일을 하고 있었지... 답도 없었지.","뻐끔 버섯은 좀비를 날려 버릴 수 있는
직업이 있다고 해서 가봤는데 이제야 길이 보이는 것
같아..."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>가스 버섯은 스크린 도어를 관통하는 가스를
발사합니다.

<color=black>대미지 | 공격 쿨타임: </color><color=#8B0000>20 | 1.5초</color>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>가스 길이 만큼</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>좀비를 관통합니다.</color></size>

<size=30><color=#2b0057>낮 스테이지에선 필요 태양이 증가합니다!</color></size>

plants.name: 최면 버섯
plants.introduce:
<size=35><color=black>"좀비는 내 우리 친구야!"라고 최면 버섯은 주장합니다.
"그들은 우리 생태계에서 중요한데, 우린 서로 오해가
있어! 우리는 생각의 전환을 통해 다르게 접근해야 해!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>좀비가 최면 버섯을 먹으면 해당 좀비를 우리 편으로
만듭니다.

<color=black>사용 방법: </color><color=#8B0000>일회용 식물</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>당신을 위해 싸우는 좀비를 만듭니다.</color></size>

<size=30><color=#2b0057>낮 스테이지에선 필요 태양이 증가합니다!</color></size>

plants.name: 겁쟁이 버섯
plants.introduce:
<size=33><color=black>"거... 거기 누구야?" 겁쟁이 버섯의 소리가 작게 들립니다.
"빨리 저리 가! 난 서커스 사람이 아니면 보기 싫다고!</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>겁쟁이 버섯은 원거리 공격 식물로 주변에 좀비가
있으면 숨어버립니다.

<color=black>대미지 | 공격 쿨타임: </color><color=#8B0000>20 | 1.5초</color></color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>좀비가 가까이에 있으면 숨습니다.</color></size>

<size=30><color=#2b0057>낮 스테이지에선 필요 태양이 증가합니다!</color></size>

plants.name: 얼음 버섯
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>얼음 버섯은 기분이 나빠서 찡그리고 있는 것이 아니라
어릴적 사고로 인해 신경마비로 생긴 문제입니다.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>얼음 버섯은 화면에 있는 모든 좀비를 잠시 얼립니다.

<color=black>대미지: 20</color><color=#8B0000></color>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>화면 전체</color>
<color=black>사용 방법: </color><color=#8B0000>일회용 식물, 즉시 발동</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>화면에 있는 모든 좀비를 얼립니다.</color></size>

<size=30><color=#2b0057>낮 스테이지에선 필요 태양이 증가합니다!</color></size>

plants.name: 파멸 버섯
plants.introduce:
<page><size=36><color=black>파멸 버섯은 항상 "꼬마야, 내가 니 편인걸 행운으로
생각해"라고 합니다."자기가 들고 있는 모든걸 난 쉽게
파괴할 수 있다고?"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>파멸 버섯은 넓은 범위에 있는 모든 것을 부수며
크레이터를 남깁니다. 크레이터 위에는 식물을 심을 수
없습니다.

<color=black>대미지: </color><color=#8B0000>1800 (즉사 판정)</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>넓음</color>
<color=black>사용 방법: </color><color=#8B0000>일회용 식물, 즉시 발동</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>크레이터를 남깁니다.</color></size>

<size=30><color=#2b0057>낮 스테이지에선 필요 태양이 증가합니다!</color></size>
<size=30><color=#8B0000>시드패킷을 중복으로 가져갈 수 없습니다!</color></size>

plants.name: 수련잎
plants.introduce:
<size=31><color=black>수련잎은 아무 말도 하지 않습니다.
수련잎은 아무것도 알기 싫어합니다.
수련잎 위에 식물을 올려도, 아무 말도 하지 않습니다.
수련잎에 충격적인 비밀이라도 있는 걸까요? 아무도 모릅니다.
수련잎은 모두 숨겨놓기 바쁩니다.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=32>수련잎 위에 수중 식물이 아닌 식물을 심을 수 있습니다.

<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>수중 식물이 아닌 식물을 위에 심을 수 있습니다. 특정 식물을 수련잎 위에 심으면 수련잎이 변화하며 위에
심었던 식물을 90초마다 해당 수련잎 위에 심습니다.</color>

<color=#025b67>물 위에만 설치가 가능합니다!</color></size></size>

plants.name: 스쿼시
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>스쿼시는 항상 "나 준비됐어!"라며 소리칩니다.
"한탕해 보자고! 빨리 날 내려놔!
저기 있는 애들 다 뉴비잖아? 내가 다 할게, 응?!
뭘 기다리는 거야? 나 늙어 죽는다고!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>스쿼시는 다가오는 첫 좀비를 내려찍습니다.

<color=black>대미지: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>스쿼시가 내려 찍는 범위 만큼</color>
<color=black>사용 방법: </color><color=#8B0000>일회용 식물</color></size>

plants.name: 삼발슈터
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>삼발슈터는 독서, 주사위 놀이, 그리고 공원에서
오래 가만히 있는 것을 좋아합니다.
공연을 보는 것도 좋아합니다, 특히 모던 재즈로요.
"난 지금 그냥 누굴 기다리는 중이야,"
그는 항상 말하지만, 자기는 숫자 5가 좋다고 합니다.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>삼발슈터는 인접한 세 라인에 콩을 발사합니다.

<color=black>대미지 | 공격 쿨타임: </color><color=#8B0000>20(각 콩 마다) | 1.5초</color>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>세 라인</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>쓰리 피터에 인접한 위 아래 라인에도 콩을
발사합니다.</color></size>

plants.name: 엉킨 켈프
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>얽힌 켈프는 자기 자신이 안 보인다고 생각합니다.
"나 그냥 수면 아래에 있는거야... 그리고 아무도 날 못
보겠지."그의 친구들은 항상 보인다고 하지만, 그는
절대 바꾸지 않습니다.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>얽힌 켈프는 수중 식물로 자신에게 오는 좀비를 한 마리 끌어내립니다.

<color=black>대미지: </color><color=#8B0000> 즉사</color>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>코앞</color>
<color=black>사용 방법: </color><color=#8B0000>일회용 식물</color></size>

<size=30><color=#025b67>물 위에만 설치가 가능합니다!</color></size>

plants.name: 할라페뇨
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>"으으으아아아아...!" 할라페뇨의 소리입니다.
그는 폭발할 겁니다, 아직은 아니죠. 곧입니다.
진짜 곧입니다. 진짜 터지기 직전이에요!
그는 이걸 알고 있고 느낍니다. 그는 오직 이 순간만을
위해 살아왔습니다.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>할라페뇨는 한 라인을 전부 태워버립니다.

<color=black>대미지: </color><color=#8B0000>1800 (즉사 판정)</color>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>한 라인</color>
<color=black>사용 방법: </color><color=#8B0000>일회용 식물, 즉시 발동</color>

plants.name: 스파이크위드
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>스파이크위드는 하키가 최애입니다. 그는 무려 이번
시즌 박스석 티켓도 있었습니다. 자기 최애 선수 정보도
살펴보고, 사내 하키 내기에서도 항상 이깁니다. 하지만
여기 하나의 문제가 있습니다: 그가 퍽을
무서워한다는거죠.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>스파이크위드는 위에 있는 좀비를 공격하며 타이어를 터트립니다.

<color=black>대미지 | 공격 쿨타임: </color><color=#8B0000>20 | 1초</color>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>스파이크위드 위</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>타이어를 터트립니다.</color></size>

plants.name: 횃불 나무
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>모두가 횃불 나무를 좋아하고 존경합니다. 그는 항상
그의 능력으로 콩을 강화하기 위해 진실되고 변함없는
그의 우정을 모두가 좋아합니다. 하지만 그에겐
말할 수 없는 비밀이 있습니다: 그는 문맹입니다.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>횃불 나무는 자신을 지나가는 콩을 불콩으로 바꾸어
대미지를 늘립니다.

<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>지나가는 콩을 점화 하며, 점화된 콩은
대미지가 2배가 됩니다.</color></size>

plants.name: 바다 버섯
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>바다 버섯은 한 번도 바다를 본 적이 없습니다. 바다는
그의 이름에도 있고, 관련 소문도 들어봤지만, 그럴
시간이 없었습니다. 하지만, 언젠가 그는 바다에
닿을 것입니다.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>바다 버섯은 수중 식물로 짧은 사거리의 포자를
발사합니다.

<color=black>대미지 | 공격 쿨타임: </color><color=#8B0000>20 | 1.5초</color>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>짧음</color></size>

<size=30><color=#2b0057>낮 스테이지에선 필요 태양이 증가합니다!</color></size>
<size=30><color=#025b67>물 위에만 설치가 가능합니다!</color></size>

plants.name: 플랜턴
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>플랜턴은 과학을 무시합니다. 왜냐면 다른 식물들이
빛을 먹고 산소를 만들 때, 플랜턴은 어둠을 먹고
빛을 만들기 때문이죠. 플랜턴은 방법에 대해선 말을
아낍니다. "난 '마법사'가 아니다, '암흑의 힘'이란
단어도 쓰지 않지. 그냥... 할 말은 다 한 것 같군."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>플랜턴은 주변을 밝혀 안개를 없애며, 주변 식물에
빛 레벨을 줍니다.

<color=black>범위: </color><color=#8B0000>넓음</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>빛으로 안개를 무효화합니다.</color>
<color=#99582a>빛 시스템: </color><color=#8B0000>주변 3 * 3 범위에 빛 레벨을 줍니다.
빛 레벨은 빛 식물에게 강화 효과를 줍니다.
플랜턴과 조합된 식물은 빛을 만들거나 이용합니다.</color></size>

plants.name: 선인장
plants.introduce:
<size=34><color=black>그녀가 뾰족한건 사실이지만, 가시는 스폰지 같은 마음과 사랑, 선의로 가득차있습니다. 그녀는 그냥 허그를 하고
싶은 것뿐입니다. 대부분은 견딜 수 없지만, 그녀는 개의치
않아합니다. 꽤 오랫동안 아르마딜로를 만나고 있고,
관계가 나쁘지 않아보입니다.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>선인장은 지상과 공중을 대상으로 가시를 발사합니다.

<color=black>대미지 | 공격 쿨타임: </color><color=#8B0000>20 | 1.5 초</color>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>지상과 공중</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>지상과 공중을 대상으로 공격합니다.</color>

plants.name: 블로버
plants.introduce:
<size=33><color=black>블로버의 5살 생일 때, 그는 빛나는 생일 케이크을
받았습니다. 블로버는 소원을 빌며 힘차게 바람을 불었지만,
양초의 60%만 꺼트렸습니다. 그는 포기하는 것 대신
이 일을 계기로 자신을 더 극한으로 몰아붙이기
시작했습니다.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>블로버는 안개와 양동이 풍선 좀비와 좀플린 비행선을
제외한 모든 풍선 좀비를 날려버립니다.

<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>정원 전체</color>
<color=black>사용 방법: </color><color=#8B0000>일회용 식물, 즉시 발동</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>안개와 풍선 좀비를 날려버립니다.
좀플린 비행선을 뒤로 살짝 밉니다.</color></size>

plants.name: 스타푸르츠
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>스타푸르츠는 "이봐, 내가 어느 날 치과에 갔는데,
거기서 나한테 충치가 4개나 있다고 했어. 이거 봐봐.
나 이빨 하나에 충치 4개야! 4개라니?
이게 가능한 일이었어?"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>스타푸르츠는 별을 다섯 방향으로 발사합니다.

<color=black>대미지 | 공격 쿨타임: </color><color=#8B0000>20(각 별 마다) | 1.5초</color>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>다섯 방향</color>

plants.name: 호박
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>호박이 막 아르바이트를 마쳤을 때 그는 웃으
"솔직히, 이거 재밌는 경험이었어, 근데 왜 계속
내 안에 사탕이랑 양초를 넣는지 알려줄 사람?"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>호박은 껍질로 안에 있는 식물을 보호합니다.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>조합식 우선도: </color><color=#8B0000>제일 낮음</color></size>

plants.name: 자석 버섯
plants.introduce:
<page><size=36><color=black>모두가 자석 버섯의 "소화"가 오래 걸리는 이유를 알고
싶어합니다. 철분을 흡수하는 도중에도, 조합을 위해
가져가도 소화 중입니다. 항상 그 이유에 대해
자석 버섯은 "내 문제가 아냐! 나 그냥 날아오는 철에
기절해 있었다고!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>자석 버섯은 강철 물체를 끌어당겨 흡수합니다.

<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>넓음</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>강철 물체를 끌어당길 수 있습니다.</color></size>
<color=#1e81b0><size=34>자기장 시스템: </color><color=black>만약 주변 8칸에 자석 식물이 있으면
"자기장 시스템"으로 연결됩니다. 자기장 시스템 연결에는
식물 제한이 없으며, 자석 식물 개수에 기반해 몇몇 자석
식물의 성능을 강화합니다. 자석 버섯과 조합된 식물은
자기장 시스템에 연결되며 자기장 시스템을 이용합니다.</color></size>

plants.name: 양배추 펄트
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>종종 사람들은 사랑이 양배추 같다고 말합니다;
다른 사람의 마음을 보기 위해선 천천히 마음의 거리를
좁혀야 합니다. 하지만 양배추 펄트는 아직 모솔이기에
이에 대해 의구심을 가지고 있습니다.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>좀비를 공격하기 위해 양배추를 던집니다.

<color=black>대미지 | 공격 쿨타임: </color><color=#8B0000>40 | 3초</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>지붕의 경사를 무시합니다.</color></size>

plants.name: 화분
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>식물들은 항상 화분이 단순히 "화분"이라 생각합니다.
식물이라기보단 "화분"이죠. 하지만 현실은 다릅니다,
"봐! 내 위에 꽃봉오리도 있다고! 난 식물이야!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>위에 식물을 심을 수 있습니다.

<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>지붕 위에 식물을 심을 수 있게 해줍니다.</color></size>

plants.name: 옥수수 펄트
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>식물들은 옥수수 펄트의 버터가 어디서 오는지 항상
궁금해합니다. 옥수수 펄트도 사실 이유는 모릅니다만,
그게 그가 남은 시간에 부업으로 팝콘을 만드는 것을
멈추는 이유가 되진 않습니다.</color</size>
plants.info:
<size=33>좀비를 공격하기 위해 옥수수 알이나 좀비를 멈추는 버터를 던집니다.

<color=black>대미지 | 공격 쿨타임: </color><color=#8B0000>20 | 3초</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>25% 확률로 옥수수 알 대신 버터를 발사합니다.
버터는 40 대미지를 주며 좀비를 4초 동안 경직시킵니다.</color></size>

plants.name: 마늘
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>마늘은 높은 알리신을 함량을 자랑하며, 마늘을 먹으면
건강에 좋다고 주장합니다. 그게 진실이든 아니든,
좀비가 깨물 때마다 찡그리는 걸 보면 효과적인 것
같습니다.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>마늘을 먹으려 하는 좀비의 라인을 바꿉니다.

<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>마늘을 먹는 좀비의 라인을 바꿉니다.</color></size>

plants.name: 우산잎
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>우산잎은 114번째 식물 & 좀비 NBA에서 슈퍼스타로
통하는 인기 식물이었습니다. 하지만 나이가 들면서
탈모가 진행되는 자기 자신을 보며 후회하게
되었습니다.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>날라오는 농구공을 튕겨냅니다.</color>

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>1000</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>3 * 3 범위 내로 날라오는 농구공을
튕겨냅니다.</color>

plants.name: 금잔화
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>금잔화는 진짜로 돈이 "많아서" 돈을 마음대로 씁니다.
문제는 돈을 그 자리에서 만들어야 한다는 것이죠.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>돈을 생성합니다.

<color=black>생산 쿨타임: </color><color=#8B0000>25초</color>
<color=black>코인 생성 확률:
</color><color=#8B0000>75% = 은 코인(100)
20% = 금 코인(300)
5% = 다이아몬드(1000)</color>

plants.name: 멜론 펄트
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>쉬는 동안 멜론 펄트는 그의 줄기를 둘로 자주 나누고
더울 때 마다 조금씩 먹었습니다. "한 통 할래?"라는
말을 들은 좀비는 무반응이고, 더운 식물들은
부럽게 봅니다.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>좀비를 공격하기 위해 멜론을 던집니다.

<color=black>대미지 | 공격 쿨타임: </color><color=#8B0000>80 | 3초</color>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>스플래시(3 * 3)</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>투사체가 좀비를 공격 할 시 주변에
스플래시 대미지를 줍니다.</color>

plants.name: 꽃니바퀴
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>식물들에서 줄기를 해치지 않고 꽃잎을 돌리는 건
엄청난 기술입니다. 몇몇 식물학자들은 이 때문에
꽃니바퀴가 블로버의 먼 친척일지도 모른다고
추측 중입니다. 꽃니바퀴는 가식적인 말투로 "이거
엄청 어려운 거야", "진짜 문제는 가벼운 톱니바퀴를
꽃잎 문양으로 칠하고 쓰는 걸 들키지 않는 거지."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>가까이 오는 좀비를 톱날로 갈아버립니다!

<color=black>대미지 | 공격 쿨타임: </color><color=#8B0000>5 | 0.02초</color>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>코앞</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>좀비가 가까이 오면 범위 대미지를 줍니다.</color>

plants.name: 전기 리크
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Lightning Leek thought his moment had come—after <page>all, who else had eaten lightning over a hundred times? Surely, he was destined to play the Frankenstein monster! But when he received the script, his dreams short-circuited. He wasn't a star. He wasn't even a sidekick. He was just Dr. Stanley's lightning rod...</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Attack approaching zombies with lightning rays!

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>100/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Attack Range: </color><color=#8B0000>5x5</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> When another attacking Lightning Leek is in range and is idle, it will recharge, providing an additional 150 damage for this shot.
<color=black>•</color> Each hit can connect to other zombies to deal half the damage, up to a maximum of 3 zombies.</color>

plants.name: 위칠리 빈
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>The plants couldn't figure out how such a tiny bean could chill the air so effectively. But Witchill Bean <page>just grinned mischievously. "You know why Cattail sneezes when she washes clothes? Because she washes 'cat' clothes." Maybe the real magic was in its sense of humor.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Hey↑ Yeh↓！

<color=#4A2900>Unlock Conditions: Complete Wall-nut Billards 1</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> It is invincible; it will not be targeted by zombies. Can be planted on top of another plant.
<color=black>•</color> Strengthens the snow pea shooters below to launch polar ice peas, increasing the damage and Cryo Points inflicted on the zombie by 2 times.</color>

plants.name: 홍련여왕
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>작은 정령의 꽃이 어떻게 태양 생산의 마스터가
되었을까요? 비법은 바로 역경의 극복입니다.
홍련여왕은 더 이상 태양을 생산하는 데 힘을 소모하지
않으며, 그녀의 태양처럼 타오르는 머리의 불은 그녀의 힘의
기원입니다.<page>그 불은 꺼지지 않으며, 다음 홍련여왕에게 이어지고
새로운 연불꽃을 만들어내기도 합니다.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>태양 빛으로 좀비를 재로 만들어버립니다.

<color=black>대미지 | 공격 쿨타임: </color><color=#8B0000>300(각 태양마다) | 2초</color>
<color=black>공격 횟수: </color><color=#8B0000>x8</color>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>모든 라인</color>
<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>1000</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>투사체가 좀비를 타격하면 태양을 떨구며,
인페르노나무로 대미지를 4배 늘릴 수 있습니다.</color></size>

plants.name: 햄버거슈터
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>식물들은 햄버거슈터의 기원을 궁금해합니다. 특히
다른 식물을 쌓아 올려 그의 힘을 강화하는 것에
대한 것 말이죠. 사실 진실은 멀지 않습니다.
햄버거슈터는 데이브가 식물로 타코를 만들다 나온
부산물로, 포장지에는 "실제 제품은 사진과 다를 수
있음. 내용물은 자동 충전됨!"이라 적혀있습니다.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>하이브리드에서 온 선물입니다!

<color=black>대미지 | 공격 쿨타임: </color><color=#8B0000>20(각 투사체) | 3초</color>
<color=black>공격 횟수: </color><color=#8B0000>x2</color>
<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>1000</color>
<color=black>태양 생산량 | 태양 생산 쿨타임: </color><color=#8B0000> 25 | 25초</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>랜덤 투사체를 발사합니다.
선인장, 멜론 펄트, 겨울 멜론을 순서대로 조합해
업그레이드가 가능합니다.

선인장(레벨 1): 체력 2000, 공격 대미지 30,
공격 쿨타임 2.5초 공격 횟수 x4,
새 투사체: 가시, 버터, 스쿼시<page>
멜론 펄트(레벨 2): 체력 3000 공격 대미지 40,
공격 횟수 x6, 새 투사체: 여름 멜론, 멜론

겨울 멜론(레벨 3): 공격 쿨타임 2초, 공격 횟수 x8,
새 투사체: 겨울 멜론, 눈콩, 눈포자, 파멸 고드름</color>

plants.name: 히카매지션
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>히카매지션은 항상 "난 그 유명한 마술사인 따라쟁이의
라이벌이지."이라 말합니다. 하지만 그의 친우인
따라쟁이만이 진실을 알고 있습니다: 히카매지션과
닥터 좀보스는 같은 생명과학 스터디를 다녔다는 걸요.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>거대 조합을 위한 촉매제입니다.

<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>조합법에 맞는 식물을 심은 뒤 중간 식물
위에 심어 조합을 합니다.<color=#8B0000></color>

plants.name: 따라쟁이
plants.introduce:
<size=34><color=black>따라쟁이는 거치고 노인의 목소리로 "76의 좀비 전쟁이
떠오르는구나... 그런 건 없었어... 멋진 콩슈터나 할라페뇨 같은 거 말이야. 우린 그때 용기 말곤 없었지. 근성과
숟가락 말이야."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>따라쟁이는 식물을 따라할 수 있습니다!

<color=black>사용 방법: </color><color=#8B0000>복사하려는 식물 위에 설치</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>식물 위에 따라쟁이를 심어 해당 식물의
무료 시드패킷을 얻을 수 있습니다.
화분, 수련잎, 호박, 드론류는 복사가 불가능합니다.</color>

plants.name: 캣 스쿼시
plants.introduce:
<page><size=36><color=black>고양이의 우아함과 스쿼시의 투박함이 섞여 만들어진
새로운 종류의 귀여움을 가지고 있다. "언젠가 내가
양쪽 다 마스터하게 된다면, 난 정원을 정복하게
될꺼다냥!"이라고 중얼거린다. 실은 매년
고양이 자격증을 노리는 견습이다.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>가라 캣 스쿼시, 내려찍기!

<color=black>대미지: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>캣 스쿼시가 내려 찍는 범위 만큼</color>
<color=black>사용 방법: </color><color=#8B0000>일회용 식물</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>좀비를 뭉개면 최대 3개까지 좀비당 1개의
스쿼시 시드패킷을 드랍합니다. 만약 3마리 이상의
좀비를 뭉개면 스파이시 스쿼시 시드패킷을 추가로
드랍합니다. 내려찍기시 대미지를 주지 못하였다면
캣 스쿼시 시드패킷을 드랍합니다.</color></size>

plants.name: 검술사 스타푸르츠
plants.introduce:
<page><size=36><color=black>검술사 스타푸르츠는 자신의 과거에 대해 "오랜 시간
동안 전장을 누비며, 내 검은 백만명의 적을 막으리."
라는 말을 합니다. 고급 음료와 시, 그리고 엄청난
코스플레이 실력을 지닌 그는 웃으며 검에 대해서는
"내 검은 피를 흘리지 않는다. 오직 이건 장식이지."
라고 합니다... 진실은 아무도 모릅니다.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>멀리서 온 이방인으로, 좋은 친구가 될 수 있을 것 같습니다.

<color=black>대미지 | 공격 쿨타임: </color><color=#8B0000>200(검 투사체) | 6초</color>
<color=black>대미지: </color><color=#8B0000>30(주변 피해)</color>
<color=black>공격 횟수: </color><color=#8B0000>20번(주변 피해)</color>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>다섯 방향(검 발사), 중간(주변 피해)</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>공격마다 200 대미지를 주는 무한히
관통하는 검을 다섯 개 날립니다. 또한 주변 중간 범위
내에 있는 모든 좀비에게 총 600 대미지를 줍니다.</color></size>

plants.name: 좀비 상자
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>신시대를 열 상품! 좀비 상자를 소개합니다!
고수익을 얻을 수 있는 상품으로, 본 회사가 제공하는
상품에는 해당과 같은 내용이 적용됩니다: </size><size=20>큰 좀비가 나올 수
있음! 해당 사항은 소비자 과실임을 인지하고 해당 상품을 사용하는 것으로 간주함.</size><size=36> 파손
주의 물품으로, 상품 내용물은 열어보기 전까진 알 수 없습니다.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=34>태양을 100 획득하는 대신 황금 상자 좀비를 소환합니다.

<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>황금 박스 좀비를 설지한 장소에 소환합니다.</color></size>

plants.name: 해바라기 거대 호두
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Twin Solar-nut asked me to do him a favor for 500 Sun, so I came. How difficult can it be? It can't be rushing into a pile of zombies... right...? It's not, right!?</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Crushes zombies by rolling on them like a bowling ball.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color></size>
plants.cost: <size=36>Spawned when Twin Solar-nut is clicked when there's sufficient Sun.

plants.name: 캣테일 걸
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>그녀에게 물에 관해 물으면 열정적으로 "고양이는 보통
물을 무서워하지만 난 마법소냥이니 안 무서워!"라고
말합니다. 그런 말을 듣고 고양이들은 그녀를 선망의
대상으로 보지만 사실 그녀는 물을 사랑합니다. 자신을
돋보이게 하기 위해 그러는 것이죠.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>캣테일쨩은 화면에 있는 모든 좀비를 자동으로
공격합니다.

<color=black>대미지 | 공격 쿨타임: </color><color=#8B0000>40 (각 투사체) | 1.5초</color>
<color=black>공격 횟수: </color><color=#8B0000>2번</color>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>맵 전체</color></size>

plants.name: 보리
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>보리는 자기 자신을 박학다식하다고 하지만, 다른
식물들은 보리를 단역 배우라고 생각합니다."나 말고
다른 식물은 전부 일을 하고 있잖아, 안 그래?"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>보리는 일정 시간마다 랜덤한 일반, 조합, 궁극 식물로
변신합니다.

<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>30초 마다 랜덤한 식물로 변신합니다.</color></size>

plants.name: 연불꽃
plants.introduce:
<size=33><color=black>태양을 만드는 작은 꽃은 해바라기를 대신한다는 꿈을
꿨습니다. 하지만 그녀는 자신이 희생될 때 태양을
만들어낸다는 것을 깨달았죠. 모두가 그녀의 머리 위에 있는
불꽃이 매우 밝다고들 하지만, 사실 제일 빛나는 건
그녀의 의지로 가득 찬 불타는 눈입니다.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=33>연불꽃은 투사체를 흡수하고 태양을 생산합니다.

<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>투사체가 연불꽃에 닿으면 해당 투사체를
흡수합니다. 투사체 한 개에 체력을 50 감소시키는 대신
25 태양을 생산합니다. 임의의 방법으로 연불꽃이
죽을 경우 비료를 떨굽니다.</color></size>

plants.name: 거대 호두
plants.introduce:
<size=36><color=black>"난 전장에서 무적이지!"라는 큰 목소리로 말하는
모습을 보고 다른 호두들은 장엄한 모습을 보며
눈을 떼지 못합니다. "호두 덤블링 클럽에서 퇴출된지
일년, 드디어 적성에 맞는 일을 찾았어!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>거대 호두는 한 라인을 굴러가며 만나는 모든 좀비에게
피해를 줍니다.

<color=black>대미지: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>공격 범위: </color><color=#8B0000>한 라인</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>한 라인을 굴러가며 모든 좀비를 죽입니다.</color></size>

plants.name: 식물 상자
plants.introduce:
<size=33><color=black>아무도 식물 상자가 식물편을 드는지 이해하지 못합니다.
식물로도 보이지 않으며, 오히려 모든 식물의 기능을
담고 있습니다. 그는 전장에 있는 이유에 대해 "사실 난
비디오 게임을 좋아하는 대학생이야. 교수님이 여기 가면
돈을 준다고 해서 온 거고."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=33>식물 상자는 심으면 랜덤한 일반 또는 조합 식물로
변신합니다.

<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>흙 위 또는 수련잎 위에 심으면 랜덤한 식물로
변합니다. 조합이 가능한 식물 위에 심으면 해당 식물
가능한 조합 중 랜덤한 조합 식물로 강화됩니다.</color></size>

plants.name: 여왕 버섯
plants.introduce:
<page><size=36><color=black>여왕 버섯은 그녀의 부하 좀비에게 큰 애정을 가지고
있습니다. "제가 성공하는 데 큰 도움을 줬던
아이들이죠"라며 그녀는 부끄럽게 말합니다. 하지만
이 좀비들은 다른 식물에 공포를 심어주었고, 그녀는
이걸 전혀 눈치 못 챕니다.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=34>당신을 위해 싸우는 좀비를 소환합니다.

<color=black>사용 조건: </color><color=#8B0000>오디세이</color>
<color=black>특수 능력: </color><color=#8B0000>아래 좀비 중 한 마리를 랜덤하게 소환합니다.
미식축구 호두 좀보타니 | 신문 체리슈터 좀보타니 |
좀보니 | 교수 좀비</color>
<color=black>오디세이 버프:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. 소환 간격이 10초로 감소합니다. 또한 체리 여왕 버섯
및 그의 아종 조합법을 해금합니다.
2. 궁극 좀비를 소환할 수 있습니다.</color></size>

plants.name: 체리 개틀링
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"I'm not sure why the Gatling Pea has so many fans. My brother and I can fire four bullets too," Gatling Cherrybomber remarked enviously. However, the <page>truth is that everyone appreciates Gatling Pea for his kindness and outstanding culinary talents.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Gatling Cherrybomber is the strongest damage-dealer on land.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable</color>
<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>300*4/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Cherry bomb bullets now deal 3x more DMG
2. Attack Interval → 1 Second</color></size>

plants.name: 인페르노 스쿼시 나무
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>Squashed Infernowood has a high opinion of himself, but other plants regard him with disdain, particularly those in the pea family. "He's too picky! He possesses such strong power, yet it only benefits cherries," they say. This infuriates Squashed Infernowood. "I'm just allergic to peas…"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>Spawns a Spicy Squash for every 20 cherries that pass through.

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Cherry bomb bullets that pass through it become bouncing spicy squashes that explode after every bounce. After 20 of such bullets have passed, spawn a Spicy Squash in front.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Infernowood + Spicy Squash</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Bullets required for Spicy Squash → 10
2. Now spawns two Spicy Squash</color></size>

plants.name: 체리질라
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>Cherrizilla proudly says, "Many envy my dinosaur-like hairstyle." As a public figure, he's mindful of his image: "Spitting cherries and eating zombies is gross, but it's my duty."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>Cherrizilla is the ultimate defensive plant on land.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Chomping zombies restores 1000 Toughness, deal a 1000 damage, and spits out exploding cherries. Zombies with HP < 2000 will be insta-killed and restore full Toughness to Cherrizilla. Repels vehicles back, receiving at most 1/3 of its maximum Toughness. Loses 10% of max HP if current HP exceeds max.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Chewzilla + Cherry Chomper</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Can now kill zombies with less health than itself
2. 200% healing bonus and zombie damage is capped at 500</color></size>

plants.name: 둠미네이터 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>Would Death employ a fashionista? Doominator-shroom had no idea, but after noticing that he couldn't consistently frighten zombies, he turned to Hypno-shroom for some costume suggestions. Although people might not favor Death, how would they react if he wore sparkling ice wings?</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>Doominator-shroom deals immense damage, simultaneously charming and slowing down zombies.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>120/0.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Has a chance to charm zombies with HP < 50%, creating an explosion in the grid where the charmed zombie is located with thrice the normal damage.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Doomberg-shroom + Frostveil-shroom</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Fumes now deal 3x more DMG
2. Increased Freezing speed by 3 times</color></size>

plants.name: 쌍둥이 해바라기 호두
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>Twin Solar-nut, a photosynthesis master, revolutionized light energy-mass conversion, minimizing energy loss through recycling. He humbly credits the pioneers: "I'm just standing on the shoulders of giants."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>Twin Solar-nut produces Sun every time it is injured.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Regardless of the damage type, each attack on it will only reduce 50 Toughness. Produces 15 Sun after every hit. Clicking on it consumes 500 Sun, causes a Giant-nut to come rolling down, and restores 1500 Toughness.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>(Sunflower + Wall-nut) + Wall-nut</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Restore full Toughness instead
2. Toughness reduced per hit → 10</color></size>

plants.name: 옵시디언락
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>After being baptized by fire and ice, Spikesidian became as hard as steel, but its temperament also became erratic. This change is likely due to the steel that condensed in its mouth, making it reluctant to speak.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Spikesidian can deal immense damage while also tanking multiple tires.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>6000</color>
<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>100*2/1 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Spikecicle + Spikinferno</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Damage multiplied by 5
2. Gains 95% DMG Reduction</color></size>

plants.name: 둠 개틀링
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>"Gatling Doom is dangerous and should not be approached. It is a forbidden force in the world." Despite the frightening tales circulating among the plants, Gatling Doom is not as it seems. In fact, it is one of the friendliest plants. However, the zombies turned to ashes would disagree.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>Destruction incarnate. Fires rounds of destruction unlucky enough to face its wrath.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>300*4/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Fires a bullet of doom that deals 1800 damage once every 4 round of bullets. Each bullet will splash damage over a large area.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Gatling Pea + Doom-shroom</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. No more rest between every attack
2. Can now fire bullets of doom every round</color></size>

plants.name: 고드름 개틀링 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>The little puff-shrooms who once shouted, "We are going to join the army!" have matured into veterans with resolute eyes. Wherever and whenever, the Gatling Icicle-shroom Company is committed to ensuring that the mission is accomplished.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>Can be stacked three times to shoot 12 icicles at once!

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>20*4*3/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#0077b6>Cryo System: </color><color=#8B0000>Each hit adds 5 Cryo Points. Icicles deal 4 times more damage to frozen enemies. Each icicle can pierce 3 times.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Puff-shroom + Gatling Snow (In Order)</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Increased icicles' penetration to 10 times
2. Increased damage to Frozen zombies by 10x</color></size>

plants.name: 중성자 스타푸르츠
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>No one knows where Magnetar is from, but one thing's for sure: He was not responsible for the dinosaurs. Not at all!</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>Why the heck is there a meteor on my lawn!?

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>25*5/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=#99582a>Lumos System: </color><color=#8B0000>+20 Damage per Lumos Level.</color>
<color=#495057>Magnetic System: </color><color=#8B0000>+5% Damage per Magnetic Plant.
<color=#6A0C9D>Both systems can increase the damage of the stars by upto 300, maximum.</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Summons a meteor every 20 seconds, dealing 1800 damage upon impact. Splits into multiple stars that home in on zombies and deal 100 damage each.</color></color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Stardrop + Magnethorn</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Attack Interval → 0.5 Seconds
2. Base damage is doubled and limiter (120) is removed</color></size>

plants.name: 망각 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>"Nuclear deterrence is beneficial. Someday, the zombies will stop their assaults out of fear of my formidable self-detonation," Oblivion-shroom asserted with confidence. Yet, it was evident that Oblivion-shroom failed to understand that zombies wouldn't initiate a Cold War just because they were hit with cold air.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>Sprays deadly fumes all around, bringing ultimate destruction. Beware!

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>(100+100*8)*4/1.9 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Damage Range: </color><color=#8B0000>5*5</color>
<color=black>Search Range: </color><color=#8B0000>5*3</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Doomberg-shroom + Snowgloom-shroom</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Damage on death → 1,000,000
2. Now absorbs explosion damage. When 10,000 damage is absorbed, a Doom-shroom explosion is released</color></size>

plants.name: 레이저 호박
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>"Magnet-shroom's power remains unmatched," said Laser Pumpkin. "After all, composite armor, electromagnetic catapults, and plasma guns came nearly a century after aircraft carriers." Other plants envied Laser Pumpkin's high-tech gear, but only Magnet-shroom knew his power came from a Magnetar meteorite.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>Spawns laser drones that home in on enemies.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Always has a Laser Drone wingman with him when he appears. Generates a Laser Drone on top of a 3x3 grid regularly.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Bloverthorn Pumpkin + Magblover</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Wingmen Amount → 3
2. Inherits Joker Pumpkin's effects when in the same Magnetic System | Blast Pumpkin Sub-species Unlocked</color></size>

plants.name: 레이저 드론
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Thanks to Magnetar, now we have an entire arsenal of hi-tech equipment! Take a look at these beauties: Composite alloy armor, electromagnetic rotor, and plasma railgun... Wait, NO!!! THAT WAS MY FAVORITE VASE!!!</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Laser Drones shoot piercing lasers to attack.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>200/1.5 Seconds (Plant)
200/1 Seconds (Wingman)</color></size>

plants.name: 흑요석 키다리 호두
plants.introduce: <size=29><color=black>Rather than seeking his best friend's protection, this plant prefers to protect him. With a hard, gem-like body and steadfast gaze, he's forged by the Obsidian-nut's soul, enduring trials of ice and fire. Though his body may wear down one day, he's determined to keep other plants safe.</color></size></size>
plants.info:
<size=29>The Obsidian-nut has four times the defense of a normal Tall-Nut.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>32000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Restores 1500 HP every 15 seconds. Resists being run over by a car, taking a maximum of 200 damage each time. When one Obsidian-nut receives damage it is shared and divided among all Obsidian-nuts on the lawn.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Frost-nut + Scorch-nut</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Recovers 10,000 Toughness when affected by Ice-shrooms. Full Toughness if Jalapeno
2. Damage mitigation for the two plants on its left and right</color></size>

plants.name: 위더 펄트
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>After overcoming past struggles, Wither-pult now aims for a calm life. "All I want now is to watch classic movies and live in peace."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Capable of rapid, spread-fire volleys of projectiles.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>120/2 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>42% chance of rapid-firing. Has an equal chance to spread-fire in a number equal to the number of zombies in its lane. Projectiles split into garlic, corn, and melon upon impact.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Salad-pult + Garlic-pult</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
<color=#8B0000>1. Spread-fire is now guaranteed
2. Melon Pot's traits are now inherited</color>

plants.name: 망각 옥수수 대포
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Clad in icy armor and dark as a warning, each shot from Cob-livion Cannon brings destruction. Zombies hit by it need not prepare—nothing will remain after the flash.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Possesses earth-shattering power.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>Main Blast - 1800 in a 3x3 area. Additional 1800 + 30% of Zombies' max HP across the entire screen. Side gun: 360*2/1.5 Seconds with Slow </color>
<color=black>Arming Time: </color><color=#8B0000>36 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Cryo Cannon + Cryodoom-shroom</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
<color=#8B0000>1. Main Blast damage is multiplied by 4
2. Reload Time → 12 Seconds</color>

plants.name: 마이더스 우산잎
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>From its appearance, you can tell that Midas Umbrella has a knack for business. "That's right, my hat of emerald was a trade item I exchanged with someone from a place full of blocks..."</color>
plants.info:
<size=30>A combination of Alchemist Umbrella and Umbrella Kale.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Has the traits of both its materials. Also allows projectiles to hit zombies in the two rows below. Its Coffee Bean ultimate can instantly kill zombies below 50% health.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Alchemist Umbrella + Umbrella Kale</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
<color=#8B0000>1. Projectiles will continuously bounce along other Midas Umbrella until the last one. Each bounce increases projectile damage by 1.8x.
2. Activates ultimate automatically if zombies are near. 7.5 seconds cooldown | Aegis Umbrella Sub-species Unlocked</color>

plants.name: 체리 여왕 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=31><color=black>The subjects of the Empress-shroom are captivated by the Enchantress-shroom’s mysterious power. She’s not just my advisor; she's the force that keeps our kingdom thriving. Her magic isn't just powerful—it's explosive, the Empress-shroom declared. In truth, the Enchantress-shroom simply delights in blowing up any unruly dissenters who dare resist her charm.</color>
plants.info:
<size=31>Summons Gatling Cherry Newspaper zombies to fight for you.

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>The same as Empress-shroom, but only summons Gatling Cherry Newspaper zombies. Benefits from Empress-shroom buffs and immediately summons when an Empress-shroom dies in a 3*3 radius, Empress-shroom too when a nearby Enchantress-shroom dies.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Empress-shroom + Cherry Bomb</color>

plants.name: 그을은 삼발슈터
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>The flames consume his broken body, each breath a torment, yet the Ashen Threepeater stands tall. He believes the fire within will achieve eternal glory in one final, grand explosion.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Ashen Threepeater awaits his rebirth.

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Loses attack capabilities after being thoroughly burnt.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Scorched Threepeater + Jalapeno</color>

plants.name: 피닉스 삼발슈터
plants.introduce: <size=32><color=black>No one knows if fire truly brings rebirth to plants—it’s just a legend. Those who chased it turned to ash, until he became the new legend. I don’t know how many times I must endure the flames to succeed, but for them, I have to.</color>
plants.info:
<size=32>From fire reborn!

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>160x3/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Torches the whole lawn on entry, projectiles inflict Enflamed debuff, pierce three times with damage doubled after passing Squashed Infernowood.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Ashen Threepeater + Jalapeno</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
<color=#8B0000>1. Enflamed damage multiplier → 150%, and ignited peas can now inflict the debuff
2. Bullets can now pierce infinitely</color>

plants.name: 중력 자성 블로버
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>The Gravitron has mastered electromagnetism with Magnetar. "It's not rocket science—left-hand force, right-hand electricity", it boasted. "And don’t forget the moving magnet—trust the smartest plant around!"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Gravitron pulls stars, accelerates them and launches at zombies at max force.

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Storage Limit - 60, Acceleration Time - 1.5 Seconds, Damage - thrice</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Magnetar + Blover</color>

plants.name: 갈릭질라
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Dressed in plain clothes with a gaudy gold tooth, one word from him sends others fleeing. 'Garlick me, I've had enough of the spotlight. Standing out doesn't suit me anymore—I just want a quiet, simple life.'</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Cousin to the ultimate defensive plant on land.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>A Cherrizilla variant that no longer heals from cherry explosions, inherits garlic properties, and shoots projectiles that poison zombies. Can be switched to Cherrizilla with a Cherry Bomb and vice versa with a Garlic. Unlocked alongside Cherrizilla.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Cherrizilla + Garlic</color>

plants.name: 체리 호박
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Cherry? Pumpkin? Or a hybrid born of fusion? The Blast Pumpkin doesn’t bother with such details. For him, Halloween is all about handing out juicy cherries to the good kids and cherry bombs to the naughty ones—nothing else matters. </color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Blast-proof pumpkin.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>No longer spawns hover drones, immune to cherry explosions and heals from them. Every 30 seconds spawns a self-destructing drone that seeks out zombies and explodes like a Cherry Bomb.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Laser Pumpkin + Cherry Bomb</color>

plants.name: 에이기스 우산잎
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Many question the relationship between Midas Umbrella and Aegis Umbrella. 'We’re brothers!' Aegis confidently declares, thumping its canopy. 'My dear elder brother is just going through a rough patch emotionally.'</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Reflects projectiles from zombies.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>A variant of the Midas Umbrella. You can switch between the two with Melon-pults and Cabbage-pults. Aegis loses the ability to buff lobbed projectiles but now gains a 90% Damage Reduction and can reflect zombie projectiles.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Midas Umbrella + Melon-pult</color>

plants.name: 유혹 자석 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=34><color=black></color>
plants.info:
<size=34>Charisma maxima.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>80/2 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Projectiles have a 1-tile splash radius with no falloff, cannot be consumed by zombies. Feeding it metal objects grants 1 charge level for 30 seconds, up to 2 charges. At 1 charge level, it fires 2 shots per attack and 2 charge level, 4 shots. Each plant in the same Magnetic System provides a 5% damage boost to its shots.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Charm-shroom + Charm Magnet</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Buffs:
<color=#8B0000>1.Charm HP threshold increased from 50% to 100%
2. Now always in a fully-charged state | Attack Interval → 1 Second</color>

plants.name: 흑요석 지뢰
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Obsidian-mine posseses immense power despite its size. He fears no zombies. However, it has its troubles, as block people with diamond pickaxes often come to knock on its head.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Has extremely high toughness and can block Diggers.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>32000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Subspecies of Obsidian-nut. You can switch between the two with Potato Mine or Tall-nut. Blocks Digger Zombies and release a small potato-nut explosion for every 1000 damage received (before damage reduction), dealing 500 damage to zombies in a small area.<size=36><color=black>
Fusion Formula: <color=#8B0000>Obsidian-nut + Potato Mine</color>

plants.name: 마법 고양이 둥지
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"I think it's better to use animal hair to keep myself above water than relying on, for example, a swim ring!" Magicat Nettle stands by her belief. Hmm... If you think this is due to her poor academic skills and inability to stay afloat on the river, you're right. How could a cat possibly swim! Though she refuses to be categorized randomly.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Summons drones to attack every time she defeats a zombie.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>160x2/1.5 Seconds, for each zombie killed summons a small floating drone on the same row, firing 30 nettle spikes with 100 damage each.</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>The more zombies there are, the fewer zombies there will be (inherits Neko Squash's trait of refunding cards upon zombie kills)</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Effects:
<color=#8B0000>1. Basic Attack Damage x5.
2. Drone Attack Damage x3.</color><size=36><color=black>
Fusion Formula: <color=#8B0000>Cattail + Neko Squash

plants.name: 아포콩리스 터렛
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Titan Apeacalypse Turret rarely interacts with people. It's not due to arrogance, but because people keep asking whether the fire on his body is hot or cold, and whether he can create hot ice or cold fire. These questions bore him.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Consumes HP to fire obsidian pelts that knock back enemies and becomes stronger the longer he shoots.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>120 per shot</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Shots knock back zombies and pierce twice, with power halved per pierce. Fires faster as HP decreases and reaches maximum speed when below 1/3 HP. If HP is further reduced, attack damage increases. Damage is capped at 480 at 0 HP. Each shot fired inflict 50 self-damage until HP is reduced to 1500. </color>
<color=black>Odyssey Effects:
<color=#8B0000>1. Defense increases as HP decreases. Below 100 health, it becomes immune to damage under 100.
2. Increases projectile damage and knockback significantly.</color><size=36><color=black>
Fusion Formula: <color=#8B0000>Titan Pea Turret + Frostburnt Jalapeno

plants.name: 재앙 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Everyone wonders how Calamity-shroom subdues massive creatures to serve her. Endless destruction should bring silence... When questioned, she sits alone atop a tower, sipping her dreamy brew: "Oblivion? No, I simply grant them rebirth within illusions."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Turn the tide of battle!

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Charms zombies in range (same as Doom-shroom) and makes them explode upon death, dealing damage like Doom-shroom.</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Effects:
<color=#8B0000>1. Doom-shroom explosions now leave no craters.
2. Summons 3 charmed Armored Gargantuars upon explosion. Each charmed zombie summons a Zomboni too.</color><size=36><color=black>
Fusion Formula: <color=#8B0000>Curse-shroom + Doom-shroom

plants.name: 태양 개틀링 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Production is also part of the fight!" said Gatling Sunburst-shroom, wiping its sweat. Its platoon has been reorganized into the 'Sunshine Bay Construction Corps,' but their fighting spirit remains undiminished.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Generates a large amount of sun for you.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>20x4x3/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Subspecies of Gatling Icicle-shroom. You can switches between the two with Ice-shroom or Sunflower. Shots no longer slow but instead drop 5 sun on hitting the 1st and 2nd zombies. Each subsequent pierce deals double the damage but requires 5 sun per hit. Synergizes with the sun value doubling Odyssey effect and dropped suns are worth 15 each when the effect is active.</color><size=36><color=black>
Fusion Formula: <color=#8B0000>Gatling Icicle-shroom + Sunflower

plants.name: 미치광이 개틀링 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Compared to the composed demeanor of Gatling Doom, Gatling Frenzy-shroom has a much shorter temper, especially when someone calls her a "Gray Egg". She often yells "Quietus!" and charges into the fray.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Continuously fires Doom-shroom attacks at zombies.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>300, attack interval shortens by 0.1 seconds per attack, to a minimum of 0.5 seconds.</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Subspecies of Gatling Doom. You can switch between the two with Peashooter or Scaredy-shroom. Fires a large bullet of doom every 16 attacks, dealing 1800 damage. When the "bullets of doom every round" effect is active, fires a large bullet of doom every 4 attacks and explodes when zombies are near regardless of attack speed.</color><size=36><color=black>
Fusion Formula: <color=#8B0000>Gatling Doom + Scaredy-shroom

plants.name: 흑요석 스파이크 호두
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black></color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>A sub-species of Spikesidian.

<color=#6A0C9D>Usage Condition: Recipe unlockable in Odyssey Mode through Spikesidian's Modifier.</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>16000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Counters any damage received back to the zombie that inflicted it. Recovers 1500 Toughness per 15 Seconds. Benefits from Spikesidian's Modifiers.</color>

plants.name: 탐욕나무
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Though still a small child, Tycoon Torch returned from abroad with a showman's flair. His "turn a stone into gold" trick had audiences roaring with delight. Backstage, as he stirred a mysterious drink, he smirked and whispered, "It's kind of magic, actually."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Turn all straight-shooting bullets into coin bullets!

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Initial Selection</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Convert all ordinary straight-shooting bullets encountered into 2 Silver Coins and 1 Gold Coin.
<color=black>•</color> Gold Coins will move in a straight line. Silver Coins will split to the top and bottom rows initially then join the Gold Coins in the middle row after a short time.
<color=black>•</color> Silver Coins will deal 100% of the original bullet's damage.
<color=black>•</color> Gold Coins will deal 200% of the original bullet's damage.</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:</color>
<color=#8B0000>1. 2% Damage increase to Tycoon Torched bullets for every 1000 Coins you have
2. Bullets that pass through it gain a Splash effect akin to flaming peas.</color>

plants.name: 둠미네이터 선인장
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Thornminator is one of the top hairstylists in town, revolutionizing botanical fashion with every masterpiece she crafts. "Real style takes real work," she says, twirling a carving knife between her fingers. Hammers and chisels may not be traditional hairstyling tools, but for her, they're essential for "fixing" even the most stubborn strands.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Can fire destructive ice spikes to attack zombies.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable With Doominator-shroom</color>
<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>300/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> A subspecies of Doominator-shroom. Use Fume-shroom and Cactus to switch between the two.
<color=black>•</color> Every time Thornminator appears, it will release an Ultimate attack, firing a large number of destructive charming ice spikes.</color>
<color=black>Ultimate: </color><color=#8B0000>Every time it appears, it will fire a large number of destructive charming ice spikes.</color>

plants.name: 천상의 양배추
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>The Sun God—lord of light and warmth, the eternal ruler of the heavens. Wherever he treads, darkness withers, and life flourishes under his radiant embrace. Suspended high above the firmament, his indomitable glow pierces the void, casting away despair and igniting hope in all who bask in his presence. His light is eternal, his will unshakable—the beacon that guides the world forward.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Summons a Mini Sun to attack zombies.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable</color>
<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>300x5/2 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Summons a Mini Sun every 30 seconds. The Mini Sun lasts for 15 seconds and deals 30 + (30 * Amount of Helios Cabbages) damage to all zombies every 0.5 seconds.
<color=black>•</color> When the total amount of Sun is higher than 15000, consume 250 Sun to inflict double the damage each time the Mini Sun damages zombies.
<color=black>•</color> When the Mini Sun is present, the drop rate of Sun in the level is greatly increased, the damage of ordinary meteors is buffed by 20, and an additional 250 Sun is dropped when they land.</color>
<color=black>Ultimate: </color><color=#8B0000>Costs 1000 Coins; if there is no Mini Sun on the field, summon it immediately. Otherwise, extend the duration of the Mini Sun by 15 seconds. Only one Mini Sun can exist at a time.</color>
<color=black>Related Odyssey Modifier: Magnetar Synergy</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> You need to have unlocked all the Odyssey Modifiers of Magnetar and Helios Cabbage to obtain this synergy.
<color=black>•</color> When there are at least 10 Magnetars and 10 Helios Cabbages on the field, the Magnetar will summon the Helios Meteor instead, while Helios' summoned Mini Sun will not disappear and will also continue to summon ordinary Meteors.
<color=black>•</color> Helios Meteor: Deals damage equal to (1800 + 1800 x Amount of Magnetars) x (1 + 0.2 x Amount of Helios Cabbages), and drops 1250 Sun.</color>

<color=black>Main Odyssey Modifiers:</color>
<color=#8B0000>1. Its projectiles gain the effect of Solar-pult's projectiles
2. Its summoned Mini Sun will deal 3x more damage</color>

plants.name: 기계 호박
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>After a full-scale mechanical overhaul, Mechanized Pumpkin was a fortress on wheels. Composite armor? Check. Iron reinforcements? Double check. Tactical interface? You bet. Everything was perfect... until he caught a glimpse of his reflection. A crab. They turned him into a crab. "Guys, seriously?! A little heads-up would've been nice!"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A pumpkin with many functions.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Initial Selection</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color>
<color=#8B0000>Has a multitude of traits.
<color=black>•</color> Immune to Jack-in-the-Box explosions.
<color=black>•</color> Allows Digger Zombies to come out of the ground early.
<color=black>•</color> Halves damage from Cherry explosions.
<color=black>•</color> Allows you to use Iron objects to regain Toughness.</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers: </color><color=#8B0000>To Be Determined</color>

plants.name: 빛나는 화분
plants.introduce: Deep in the garden, where the sun always shines, Radiant Pot stands in quiet devotion. He doesn't chatter, nor does he boast—he simply gives, weaving sunlight into golden coins, waiting patiently for you to grow as radiant as he is.
plants.info:
<size=36>Can quickly generate a lot of Sun and Coins.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Initial Selection</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Produce 50 Sun and 100 Coins every (x = 15 * Current Sun / 15000, where 3 ≥ x ≥ 15) Seconds</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:</color>
<color=#8B0000>1. Upgrade costs from Silver Pots to Golden Pots will not exceed 8000
2. Gold Coins exceeding the maximum amount will be converted into half the Sun</color>

plants.name: 테슬라 우산잎
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Once the beloved director of the Plant Orphanage, she was more than just a caretaker—she was family. Her broad leaves were the perfect playground for young sprouts, offering shade, comfort, and joy. Though those days have passed, her kindness remains. "Oh? Would you like to try this marshmallow, my boy?" she asks, her warmth as enduring as ever.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Shoots lasers to attack zombies.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Initial Selection</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>1000</color>
<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>300</color>
<color=black>Energy Limit: </color><color=#8B0000>2000</color>
<color=black>Search Range: </color><color=#8B0000>(2 * Lumos Level + 1) Rows</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> It has all the traits of Lumos Umbrella.
<color=black>•</color> Fires lasers to attack zombies, dealing 100% damage every second. Prioritizes zombies in the sky, and deals x3 damage to air targets. Can attack up to 4 zombies at a time.
<color=black>•</color> When there are injured plants within a 3x3 range, Energy will be consumed to heal the plants. Each treatment consumes 200 Energy Points and restores 20% of its maximum Toughness, not exceeding 2000.
<color=black>•</color> When two Tesla Umbrellas are positioned one above and one below, they will link together, and their detection range will expand to cover the entire screen. In this state, the two Tesla Umbrellas can simultaneously attack up to 6 zombies, and their damage is doubled. Additionally, if exactly 6 zombies are being attacked, a 3x3 explosion will occur at the location of a random zombie every 6 seconds, dealing 300% of the attack power as damage.</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:</color>
<color=#8B0000>1. Energy Limit x10 | Recovery Speed x20 | Healing Speed x2
2. Normal Attack Multiplier → 300% | Explosion Multiplier → 1000% | Attack Interval → 2 Seconds</color>

plants.name: 탐욕 버섯
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Fear, doubt, hesitation? Please. Those emotions crumble before the might of greed." Avarice-shroom flipped a gold coin into the abyss, listening as it vanished into the void. She knew the power she wielded—desire was her domain, and no one resisted for long. Even Calamity-shroom, with all his heart-twisting abilities, couldn't match her touch. She turned her gaze toward the darkness. "Come out," she called softly. "I can feel you. There's no point in hiding."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>She can summon Supreme zombies!

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable With Calamity-shroom's Modifier</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> A subspecies of Calamity-shroom. Use a Doom-shroom and Marigold to switch between the two.
<color=black>•</color> Summons a Supreme Zombie after it spawns, depending on the scene:
Day: Professor Cherryz | Night: Giga Rugby Striker | Pool: Jackson Worldwide | Fog: Skystrider Mecha | Roof 1: Pozeidon | Roof 2: Clown Jill-in-the-Box | Roof 3: Ultra Mecha-nut
<color=black>•</color> At the same time, summons its ordinary Odyssey variant on all rows.
<color=black>•</color> Defeating the Supreme Zombie gives you a ton of Sun, Coins, and points.
<color=black>•</color> Defeating an ordinary Odyssey variant gives you 1 Plant Giftbox.
<color=black>•</color> It can only be summoned once per round. This plant will not spawn from a Plant Giftbox.</color>

plants.name: 콩슈터 해바라기
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Actually, the Sunflower behind me is my sister," Peashooter explained to everyone. "We've been inseparable since birth. She loves producing Sun, and I destroy zombies on her behalf." But everyone knows the truth: the cheerful Pea brother is a total siscon. After all, every zombie that gets near his sister mysteriously ends up vaporized by sunlight.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Pea Sunflower can fire Sun Bullets which produce Sun.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>100/5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Bullets drop 5 Sun when hitting zombies.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Peashooter + Sunflower</color></size>

plants.name: 풋체리슈터
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"You think I have red-hot anger issues? Me? Bah! You're red and hot! Your whole family is red!" Cherryshooter despised being teased about the color of his head. But the jokes didn't last long. It was just a happy incident. After eating special cherries, Peashooter found himself turning red and hot, and surprisingly, he could shoot cherries.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Cherryshooter fires powerful cherries.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>60/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Peashooter + Cherry Bomb</color></size>

plants.name: 해바라기 폭탄
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"So… it's obvious… we are Pretty Cure, aren't we?" The two Sunflower sisters tried to suppress their excitement. "The world needs us to save it!" Their passion bubbled over as they shouted together, "Light! Illuminate this land!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Solar Bomb can produce Sun after killing zombies.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>1800 (Cremator)</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Produces 25 Sun for each zombie killed in the explosion.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Sunflower + Cherry Bomb</color></size>

plants.name: 체리 호두
plants.introduce: <size=35><color=black>"I heard some zombies grumbling about their inability to eat cherries. Well, here I am!" The cheerful Cherry Nut shook the leaves atop his head, boasting about his pure cherry flavor. "But first, you have to promise me something: when you have cherries, share a bit with me. In fact, just give me everything you've got! I was born for this!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=35>Cherry-nut can absorb explosion damage and restore toughness.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Absorbs Cherry explosion damage to restore toughness. (From Ally: 25, From Enemy: 200)</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Cherry Bomb + Wall-nut</color></size>

plants.name: 땅콩
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"No... don't call me ugly, or else... wait... I'll spray you." Pea-nut has always struggled with his "unique" appearance. But he firmly believes that what's inside a plant matters more than how it looks. Seeking guidance, he humbly asked senior Bowling Nut for advice and eventually mastered the technique of rolling nuts like bowling balls.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Pea-nut fire mini-nuts that can penetrate zombies.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Seconds (Piercing) </color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Peashooter + Wall-nut</color></size>

plants.name: 체리슈터
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Meet Explod-o-shooter, the ultimate plant killer. He's more irritable than ever—who would've thought the warm and friendly Cherryshooter would swallow another special cherry? Don't push your luck with him. That cherry stuck in his throat might just be his next shot—his face is already turning red!</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>The cherries fired by Explod-o-shooter will cause area explosion damage. He's also immune to cherry explosion.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>300/3 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Peashooter + Cherry Bomb + Cherry Bomb</color></size>

plants.name: 태양 호두
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Solar-nut always sees himself as an angel, blissfully unaware that the other plants often talk behind his back. "You know, if he adds a few black lines, he'd look exactly like a bee!"</color></size>

plants.name: 지뢰슈터
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Pea Mine may not have eyes, but he has his own special way of sensing zombies. "I feel it…" he murmured, "The zombies are getting closer… closer… closer…" Pea Mine's heartbeat quickened, and so did his firing speed. Faster, faster… until, with a "bang," Pea Mine exploded into a burst of potato-flavored fireworks.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Pea Mine can attack before unearthing.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Attacks faster as zombies get closer. Upon exploding, releases 36 projectiles in all directions.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Peashooter + Potato Mine</color></size>

plants.name: 풋체리피터
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Cherrypeater lives by the motto "good things come in pairs." Whether it's fighting zombies or handing out presents, he does it all in twos. "But come on," Repeater teased, "those cherries of yours aren't even close to ripe."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Cherrypeater can fire two cherries at a time.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>60*2/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Repeater + Cherry Bomb</color></size>

plants.name: 태양 지뢰
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Stop at red lights, slow down at yellow lights, and obey traffic rules!" Solar Mine frequently warns zombies. But to the zombies, all they see is the disgusting green hue before them. He clutches his green leaves and pouts, wishing for more sunshine. "After all, sunshine is what fuels us all!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Solar Mine produces Sun until and after its explosion.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>Sun Output: </color><color=#8B0000>25/15 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Sunflower + Potato Mine</color></size>

plants.name: 호두 지뢰
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Once seen as small and weak, Mine-nut now stood tall and strong, boasting a pair of big eyes and firm flesh. Yet beneath that sturdy exterior, he felt fragile and feared shrinking back to his former size. The zombies quipped, "If you take another bite, you'll explode!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Mine-nut can explode while being eaten and once when broken.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>500 / Explosion, 1800 / Death</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Wall-nut + Potato Mine</color></size>

plants.name: 먹깨비슈터
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Chomper has always envied Chomp-shooter's ability to spit out zombie remains, and he's tried to learn the trick more than once. Little did he know, though, that the secret wasn't a special skill—it was just that Chomp-shooter's mouth was slightly deformed, causing bits of zombie to leak out while chewing.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Chomp-shooter can fire parts after biting.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000> Instant Kill</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Spits out rolling zombie parts after biting that deals 80 damage.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Peashooter + Chomper</color></size>

plants.name: 먹깨비 호두
plants.introduce: <size=34><color=black>As a young plant, Chomp-nut was notoriously picky about food, never swallowing zombies in one bite, which frustrated its parents. After much persuasion, Chomp-nut finally learned to consume zombies whole, just like its predecessors. "I'm not picky! I just want to imitate how zombies eat. I should try something new, right? It's definitely not because I don't have a neck!" Chomp-nut said while chewing on a zombie.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=34>Chomp-nut can restore toughness after eating zombies.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000> Instant Kill</color>
<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Wall-nut + Chomper</color></size>

plants.name: 먹깨비질라
plants.introduce: <size=32><color=black>Chewzilla savors every meal, despite his smaller mouth. "Big mouths are sloppy and don't hit the gym; they fall apart on the front line," he scoffs. "I only eat the essence of zombie meat and spit out the rest," he grins, though his backyard is filling up with leftovers.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=32>Chewzilla can both be a bulwark and fierce attacker.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Eating zombies restores 200 Toughness and deals 200 Damage while spitting out rolling zombie parts that inflict 80 Damage and pierce infinitely. Zombies with HP < 500 and no armor are instantly killed, restoring 400 Toughness and spitting out rolling zombie parts.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Peashooter + Wall-nut + Chomper</color></size>

plants.name: 태양 먹깨비
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Everyone was curious about how Solar Chomper transformed the zombies it devoured into sunlight, but it always hesitated to share its secret. One day, Sunflower discovered that her chlorophyll content had significantly diminished, revealing the truth: it wasn't actually turning zombies into sunlight.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Solar Chomper can produce Sun after swallowing zombies.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000> Instant Kill</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Produces 100 Sun after swallowing zombies.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Sunflower + Chomper</color></size>

plants.name: 지뢰 먹깨비
plants.introduce: <size=34><color=black>Delicious and enticing, Potato Mines taste just like self-heating mashed potatoes, earning rave reviews from zombies. Among them, fries take the top spot in popularity. As zombies flock to the tantalizing aroma of French fries, they have no idea they're also indulging in tasty potato chips. "Just wait and see," Chomp-mine said with a mouthful, "Their nutrients will soon become new mines."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=34>After swallowing a zombie, the Chomp-mine will grow Potato Mines in front.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000> Instant Kill</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Plants a Potato Mine in front of it upon swallowing a zombie.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Potato Mine + Chomper</color></size>

plants.name: 체리 먹깨비
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Ever since her drink with Cherry Bomb, Chomper has been constantly "buzzing." She turned into an absolute menace every meal. The sound of chewing transformed into explosive pops as plates and bowls flew everywhere, leaving everyone unwilling to dine with her. After a show of hands, Cherry Chomper ended up eating in the yard… at least she no longer has to buy new tableware.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Produces a cherry explosion upon eating a zombie.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000> Instant Kill + 1800 (Cremator)</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Creates a Cherry explosion in a 3x3 grid when biting.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Cherry Bomb + Chomper</color></size>

plants.name: 풋체리 개틀링
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Gatling Cherry's barrel was always red hot. He assured everyone that it was preheated to ensure faster firing. Everyone bought the story—until they caught him eating special cherries without even removing the barrel.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Cherryshooter's final form!

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>60*4/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Gatling Pea + Cherry Bomb</color></size>

plants.name: 콩슈터 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Don't let my size fool you; even a small body can contain a lot of energy," Pea-shroom cautions those who underestimate him. "We all began as tiny mushrooms, making progress a little at a time. With dedication to a sunny breakfast, you can become just like me."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Pea-shroom shoot further than Puff-shroom.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Puff-shroom + Peashooter (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: 리피터 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Who am I? The double-shot holds the answer!" exclaims the little Repeat-shroom, proudly flaunting the twin leaves atop its head. With double the firing rate and double the cheer, these spirited beings thrive in groups, eagerly pouring their firepower onto the battlefield, showcasing that size doesn't define their strength.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Repeat-shroom can fire two small peas at a time.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>20*2/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Puff-shroom + Peashooter * 2</color></size>

plants.name: 양동이 슈터
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"I embody the spirit of my ancestors; I will not fall here!" Buckshooter asserted confidently to anyone who crossed his path. When it was pointed out that his helmet resembled one stolen from the Buckethead Zombie, he countered, "Then let us invoke their will and ride the winds and waves once more!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Buckshooter has the ability to crack armor.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>2000</color>
<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>80/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Knocks back on contact. Deals immense damage to Iron Zombies, and break iron doors.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Peashooter + Bucket</color></size>

plants.name: 꼬마 호두 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Nut or mushroom? Why worry about labels? Nut-shroom isn't about to tell you it's actually a matsutake in disguise anyway.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Nut-shroom can be your stalwart defender despite its size.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>2000</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Puff-shroom + Wall-nut (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: 축소 최면 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"As a kid, I believed zombies were nothing more than fairy tale monsters," Mini Hypno-shroom said softly. "Now, don't get it twisted—I'm just restoring them to the fairy tale form they were always supposed to have."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Shrinks a zombie and makes it fight for you!

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Makes a zombie smaller (cuts Health in half) and fight for you.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Puff-shroom + Hypno-shroom (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: 향수 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=34><color=black>The colorful Perfume-shroom makes a grand debut! With a blast of perfume, it can turn zombies around in an instant. Some claim it's a secret technique passed down by the mushroom family, while others believe it's a cutting-edge military weapon. Perfume-shroom just smiles and says, "It's all thanks to Hypno-shroom helping me rinse my mouth everyday."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=34>Perfume-shroom spray fumes that can charm zombies.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Seconds (Piercing) </color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Chance to charm zombies with <50% Health. Hypnotizes the zombie that eats it.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Fume-shroom + Hypno-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: 몽롱 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=33><color=black>Scaredy-shroom has always been afraid of zombies. In order to reduce her fear, Hypno-shroom tells her a bedtime story every day: "Actually, there are good people among zombies." Over time, Scaredy-shroom was finally brainwashed. Now she can use spores to brainwash zombies. Of course, she is still very afraid.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=33>Trippy-shroom can fire spores in 7 colors.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Randomly fires 1 of 7 types of spores. When a zombie is hit by all 7 types of spores, it will be charmed. Each time it is hit by a type of spore, the charm probability of the Perfume-shroom will increase.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Hypno-shroom + Scaredy-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: 뻔뻔 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Courage fills me, no fear remains~ Whether it's spring, fall, winter, or summer~" Gutsy-shroom no longer shrinks in the face of zombies. "I used to tremble, but Senior Fume-shroom told me, 'If a zombie gets near, spray your spores. Hiding won't solve anything.'"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Gutsy-shroom is ready to take on the zombies, near or far!

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>20*2/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>When zombies get close by 3 tiles, they will spray piercing fumes instead.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Fume-shroom + Scaredy-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: 매혹 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Charm-shroom speaks with a soft smile, "Each spore carries my love, and when they bloom, it's like a spring breeze caressing the air." She even twisted her head into a heart to express her feelings. Her eyes shine with sincerity, hoping that maybe, just maybe, the zombies will understand her love.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Charm-shroom can fire explosive Charm spores.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>80 / 1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>40 splash damage in a 1x1.5 grid. Has a chance to charm zombies with < 50% HP.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Fume-shroom + Scaredy-shroom + Hypno-shroom</color></size>

plants.name: 키다리호두
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"The taller you are, the more powerful you become." Tall-nut firmly believed in this, which is why he always stayed on the front line. Other plants would urge him to take it easy, but he'd just smile and say, "It's fine, I'm tall. As long as you fight quickly, the zombies won't have time to eat all of me."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Tall-nuts are heavy-duty wall plants that can't be vaulted or jumped over.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color></size>

plants.name: 미식축구 호두
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Rugby-nut looked fierce, causing some small plants that didn't know the truth to feel scared by his appearance. However, the plants that understood Rugby-nut knew that beneath his serious exterior lay a strong determination to protect his companions. The stolen helmet undoubtedly boosted his confidence.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Rugby-nut is able to hold a huge amount of damage.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>16000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Can be fed metal objects to restore 500 HP.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Tall-nut + Rugby Helmet</color></size>

plants.name: 양동이 호두
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Plants hold conflicting feelings about Buck-nut. As an exemplary soldier, he executes orders with unwavering precision, yet his cold demeanor leaves much to be desired. The rust at the corners of his mouth hints at a storied past. In the quiet moments, however, Buck-nut wrestles with an unspoken worry: "How do I prevent rust in a humid garden?"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Blocks the zombies' advance with a wall of iron.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Can be fed metal objects to restore 500 HP. This also applies to other Metallic Plants.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Wall-nut + Bucket</color></size>
