plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Does a garlic made of silver still smell like garlic? Probably not, but neither the plants nor the zombies were eager to test it. However, zombies soon regretted their curiosity after a taste!</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>한국인이 보면 환장할 마늘입니다.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>600</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Marigold + Garlic</color>

plants.name: 황금 마늘
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Beneath its dazzling exterior lies an unbearable garlic scent. Golden Garlic muses, "True value is only in appearance, not in the details." But everyone knows this "golden" garlic is just a regular garlic with a shiny coat.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A stronger, gold-scented garlic that can force all zombies in front to switch lanes with its ultimate move.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>900</color>
<color=black>Ultimate: </color><color=#8B0000>Costs 1000 Coins; forces all zombies in its lane to change lanes.</color>
<color=black>Upgrade Cost: </color><color=#8B0000>1000 Coins</color>

plants.name: 최면 호두
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>Hypno-nut has a soft spot for zombies: "There's something oddly pleasant about the way they nibble on me. It's not like scratching an itch… let's just call it affection from prolonged contact," it says, philosophically.</color>
plants.info:
<size=30>Charms zombies and summons a Charmed Mystery-box Zombie every 30 Seconds!

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Each time it's bitten, there's a 4% chance to charm the zombie. Additionally, it can recover 100 health when hit by a Trippy-shroom spore, and stores one spore of that color each time it's hit (up to 3). When it collects 7 different spore colors, it consumes one of each and summons a Charmed Golden Mystery-box Zombie, then fully heals.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Wall-nut + Hypno-shroom</color>

plants.name: 연금술사 우산잎
plants.introduce: <size=32><color=black>Alchemist Umbrella is a tycoon among plants, providing jobs for zombies and plants alike. "I maximize their value," it declares with a gilded flourish to its spectacles.</color>

plants.name: 여름 멜론
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>The plants always feel that red-rinded watermelons carry the festive vibe of New Year, crackling and popping with excitement. But the watermelon explains, 'I didn’t put firecrackers in the melon! It’s just that sealed food explodes when heated—and you can’t rush eating a hot watermelon!'</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>개뜨거운 멜론을 투척합니다!

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>160/3 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Inflicts Enflamed debuff.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Melon-pult + Jalapeno</color>

plants.name: 황금 자석
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>After working countless hours at an accoutant firm, the Gold Magnet realized its terrifying attracting potential and switched careers to become a fighter. 'Honestly, this is way more fun than counting money,' it remarks. 'After all, money doesn't grow on trees, but they do somehow from crops.' That said, its plant companions often end up suffering from its antics.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>투사체를 끌어당깁니다!

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Attracts straight-shooting projectiles from adjacent lanes and produces a 25 Coin for every projectile attracted.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Magnet-shroom + Marigold</color>

plants.name: 기가 메카 호두
plants.introduce: <size=31><color=black>Giga Mecha-nut has always been passionate about environmental protection. 'I have a love-hate relationship with zombies—they pollute the environment, but they also bring me wealth. Isn’t owning property and a trailer the hallmark of success? The lawn is clean all thanks to me!'</color>
plants.info:
<size=31>It might just be another fish ball. Who knows?

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>When zombie metal drops disappear, restores 8000 HP to all Giga Mecha-nuts on the field. Using a Wall-nut on it restores 8000 HP instantly and summons a Sharkmarine. Healing can exceed max HP. Has the same anti-crush property as Cherrizilla; damage received capped at 8000 per hit. Redirects damage to itself in a 3x3 area.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Wall-nut + Giga Mecha Fragments</color>

plants.name: 양동이슈터 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Buck-shroom has a constant worry: he’s terrified of Magnet-shroom accidentally pulling him in. 'Where did my screws go?' As Crazy Dave walks up, it seems he is about to have a brand-new concern.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>작다고 좀비 못 밀쳐내는거 아닙니다.

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>1000</color>
<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>80/2 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Projectiles knockback zombies and destroy screen doors with ease.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Pea-shroom + Bucket</color>

plants.name: 스플릿 피 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>The front head declares, 'My turn to use the eyebrow!' The back head replies, 'Guess we’ll have to split it.' Born just two minutes apart, their eternal battle over the eyebrow shows no signs of stopping.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>양쪽으로 콩을 발사합니다.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>20x3/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Backward peas rebound if no zombie is hit.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Puff-shroom + Peashooter * 3</color>

plants.name: 태양 자석 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Have you heard? Solar Magnet's been glowing with wealth lately! 'I don’t produce iron; I just do the delivery,' he says proudly. 'This is all from years of hard work.' Word is, he’s even opened business beyond the lawn!' </color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Produces metal objects and turns metal objects to sun.

<color=black>Sun Output: </color><color=#8B0000>25/25 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Produces a random metal object every 30 Seconds. Spend a metal object on it and it will produce 25 sun.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Sunflower + Magne-shroom</color>

plants.name: 뜨거운 스파이크위드
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>After the test of fire, he's still the same old Spikeweed, just wiser, shinier, and ready to give zombies warmer welcome!</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Hot Spikeweed? What's the different between him and the cooler Spikeweed?

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>300</color>

plants.name: 뜨거운 켈프
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Managing a hot spring isn't easy, but Hot Kelp takes pride in having zero customer complaint. In fact they seem to enjoy their dip a little too much to the point of never returning.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Hot Kelp? Does he live in lava or something?

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>300</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>？</color>
<color=black>

plants.name: 최면 자석 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>After countless days and nights of research, Charm Magnet finally mastered the art of the magnetic charm field. 'Now I can better persuade zombie friends to fight alongside us,' he said. 'Some think I threaten them with metal tools, but one day, the truth will come to light.'</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Consumes metal objects and summon the corresponding zombies to fight for you.

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Uses metal objects to spawn hypnotized zombies, auto-uses metals generated from Solar Magnet behind itself and those consumed by Magnet-shrooms in the same Magnetic System.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Hypno-shroom + Magnet-shroom</color>

plants.name: 자석 가스 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>'I used to ferment bread,' Lure-shroom explained, 'but now I collect metal to build the bread ovens.'</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>양동이를 주면 흥미로운 일이 생길 것 같군요.

<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Deals twice the damage to metallic zombies.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Fume-shroom + Magnet-shroom</color>

plants.name: 가스틸 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>'I got canned again!' Cries Rust-shroom who used to be Lure-shroom just a moment ago, 'All I did was accidentally making a coffee maker rather than an oven!'</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>럭비 헬멧을 주면 또 다른 반전이 있을까요?

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>2000</color>
<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>40/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Deals thrice the damage to armors.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Fume-shroom + Magnet-shroom + Bucket</color>

plants.name: 미식축구 가스 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>'I've always dreamed of being a rugby player, and now I've finally got this hat of glory,' said Rugby-shroom proudly. 'But today, I've decided to take a break on the sidelines.' In reality, he's just a stadium security, keeping the overenthusiastic fans out with his spores.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>갑옷을 뚫는 가스를 발사합니다!

<color=black>체력: </color><color=#8B0000>3000</color>
<color=black>위력: </color><color=#8B0000>80/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Deals damage to armor and the zombie in the armor at the same time.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Fume-shroom + Magnet-shroom + Bucket + Rugby Helmet</color>

plants.name: 거대 콩 터렛
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>As one of the ultimate weapons of the Pea family, the Titan Pea Turret is always taught not to lie down without reason. "But my head is really heavy!" Sometimes, when being scolded, he complains like this. Of course, he doesn’t know that the Pea elders tell him not to lie down just because it's actually kind of cute when he does.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Unleashes pure pea hell onto zombies!

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>1000</color>
<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>Initially 20×30/1.5 Seconds</color><color=#8B0000> Max 20×60/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Firing speed increases the longer the turret fires and has 3 stages. Firing speed returns to normal when its attack resets. Peas may miss Imps due to the turret's height.</color>

<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Repeater + Threepeater + Repeater + Jicamagic (Place Jicamagic on Threepeater)</color>

plants.name: 체리 감자 지뢰
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Explod-o-tato Mine is a top chef, and his "hash cherries" and "potato jam" are highly praised in the plant world. If he runs out of ingredients, he will cheerfully say: "I'll go buy some."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Splits into 8 Potato Mines in surrounding tiles.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Spawns Potato Mines in a 3×3 radius upon defeat.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Potato Mine + Cherry Bomb</color>

plants.name: 지뢰 할라페뇨
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Chili Mine is a capable assistant to CExplod-o-tato Mine, but most of her dishes are given low ratings by customers. "What’s going on—" Chili Mine feels really guilty but doesn't know why. The truth is, she is not sensitive to spicy flavors and always adds too much chili.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Splits into 7 Potato Mines in her lane. 

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Spawns 7 Potato Mines in her lane upon defeat.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Potato Mine + Jalapeno</color>

plants.name: 체리 호박
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Pump-Kaboom is a distant relative of Cherry-nut, but every time Pump-Kaboom meets Cherry-nut, he is always late. "I want to come early too," Pump-Kaboom says, "but I can’t resist jumping to anything red."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A pumpkin that cannot be exploded by cherries!

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Cannot be damaged by zombie Cherry Bomb explosions and heals instead.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Pumpkin + Cherry Bomb</color>

plants.name: 슈퍼 눈 개틀링
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>As the general commander of the Pea family, Snow Commando has an aura that makes plants and zombies shudder even from miles away. But regarding his proud freezing ability, Super Ice Machine Gunner always keeps quiet about it, until one day a small pea accidentally opened his diary: "If I had known, I wouldn’t have bet against the fire sniper. Not only did I almost freeze to death in the ice fields, but I also turned into this way. Tonight, I’ll make that guy eat three big bowls of chili—"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Shoots Snow Peas at zombies, with a small chance of shooting a massive barrage!

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>20×6/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black></color><color=#8B0000>Ultimate: 3×20/0.02 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>3% chance to shoot a barrage of Snow Peas each attack.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Pea Commando + Ice-shroom</color>

plants.name: 체리 자석 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Selling well is also a skill." said the Volatile Magnet. Only Magnet-shrooms can turn hate into love. He once hated cherries the most. Actually, he still does, but perhaps he has discovered a business opportunity?</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Transmutes metal objects into explosive cherries!

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>300/2.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Consumes metal objects and turns them into explosive cherries. Each metal object can be turned into 4 cherries. Metal objects can be actively given to the Volatile Magnet for it to initiate an attack.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Magnet-shroom + Cherry Bomb</color>

plants.name: 블레이저 피
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Other snipers envy Blazer Pea for being a reliable assistant to the commander, even though she is still a little one. "Talent is one thing, but... I have to thank the commander for cultivating me!~"Blazer Pea says, but in reality, it's because Snow Commando is naturally cold and always keeps Blazer Pea as a warm-up buddy.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Can lock onto zombies anywhere on the map!

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>300/3 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Attacks cause Enflamed and deal 100 damage to nearby zombies</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Sniper Pea + Jalapeno</color>

plants.name: 슈퍼 개틀링
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Faced with the crazy zombies and powerful teammates, Pea Commando, who came to the yard for more challenges, feels immense pressure, and his temper is getting worse... However, the plants are always shocked by the extreme violent tendencies of the Pea Commando, who fires peas madly from a distance. Gatling Frenzy-shroom has already decided to ask for his contact information.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Shoots Peas at zombies, with a small chance of shooting a massive barrage!

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>20×6/1.5 Seconds
</color><color=#8B0000>Ultimate: 3×20/0.02 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>3% chance to shoot a barrage of Snow Peas each attack.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Sniper Pea + Peashooter</color>

plants.name: 거대 호박 쉘터
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Once, a pair of pumpkins dreamed of joining a circus. But after a magnetic mishap left them stuck together, they discovered a better calling: standing their ground as an impenetrable shield. The circus can wait.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Protect two tiles at once!

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>12000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Heals when affected by Cherry and Jack-in-the-Box explosions. Can only be placed on two-tiled plants.</color>

<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Joker Pumpkin + Magne-shroom + Pump-Kaboom + Jicamagic (Place Jicamagic on Magnet-shroom)</color>

plants.name: 감자 지뢰 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Some plants asked: "Why is the top of Nugget-shroom red?" Potato Sprout Mushroom then asked: "Well, let me ask you first..."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Can reproduce itself!

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Spawns a new Nugget-shroom in the same tile after 20 Seconds. Each Nugget-shroom can only reproduce once. Upon death, it deals 300 damage to nearby zombies</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Puff-shroom + Potato Mine</color>

plants.name: 겁쟁이 지뢰 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Why does Spuddy-shroom explode after a few attacks? His explanation is quite touching: "Every attack I make is burning my life!" But the truth is—he’s just a magician who doesn’t want to do much work. After a few attacks, he decides to use a potato firework to perform a grand "fungus" transformation.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Consumes HP to fire high-damage spores!

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>600/3 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Each attack costs 75 HP. If kept alive for 20 seconds after being planted, his red light will turn off with attack power reduced by 90%, but attacks will no longer cost health. Upon death, it deals 600 damage to nearby zombies.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Scaredy-shroom + Potato Mine</color>

plants.name: 마늘 가스 버섯
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>With a pale skin, a hairstyle that could rival a cathedral dome and a grin full of crooked teeth, Foul-shroom looks like it's auditioning for the villain in a fairytale. Ironically, he usually gets the role of a vampire.”</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Sprays poison gas at zombies!

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Attack adds one Poison Point to zombies. It also has inherited garlic property.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Fume-shroom + Garlic</color>

plants.name: 빙염 할라페뇨
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Cold on the outside, fiery on the inside. This is how other plants describe Frostburnt Jalapeno. "Don’t be fooled by my calm appearance, my explosive energy is beyond your imagination," murmurs Frostburnt Jalapeno. Oh, by the way, he's also quite skilled at making ice-cream.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Has both the properties of Ice-shroom and Jalapeno!

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>32000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Loses 20% health every 3 seconds. While present, absorbs damage for all plants. Upon death, triggers Jalapeno in his row and fullscreen Ice-shroom.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Jalapeno + Ice-shroom</color>

plants.name: 거대 먹깨비
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Titan Chomper Maw won the grand prix in an Gourmet king contest, finishing 10 giga garg cakes in 44 seconds — with 3 of those seconds wasted because he didn’t hear the starting whistle. "If there’s another event like this, please call me. The buffet near the garden won’t let me in anymore," said the Titan Chomper Maw during the interview.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Swallows all zombies that get too close!

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>Instakill</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Can swallow all zombies in a 1.5 space range (unless immune to Chompers, but including regular gargs), digestion time t=8+3xln(total HP of zombies) Seconds. 
For reference: Zombie - 24.8 Seconds, Buckethead - 29.9 Seconds, Giga Gargantuar - 34 Seconds, 10 Giga Gargantuars - 41 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Chomper + Chomper + Chomper + Jicamagic (Place Jicamagic on the middle Chomper)</color>

plants.name: 거대 크라켄 버섯
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Sailors whisper of the Giant Kraken of the<page>Northern Sea, its name alone enough to turn the bravest hearts cold. But Titan Kraken-shroom? He's got no time for legends. He didn't come to terrify—he came to play. And his favorite game? Pushing zombies around like driftwood.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Can repel zombies in front.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>20x2/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>1000</color>
<color=#006400>Tangled Debuff: </color><color=#8B0000> Adds 1 Tangle Value per hit, dealing additional damage based on the Tangle Value.</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Repels approaching zombies (single target) and deal 100 damage.
plants.cost: <size=36>Fusion Formula: <color=#8B0000>Tangle Kelp + [Sea-shroom] + Tangle Kelp + Jicamagic (Place On Middle)</color>

plants.name: 최면 블로버
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Plants are always curious why Hypnoblover pulls the zombies back. Hypnoblover explains: "Since Blover always pushes zombies to the opposite direction they face, I believe it's only natural for me to do the same to hypnotized zombies."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Can pull back hypnotized(charmed) zombies!

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Pulls all charmed zombies back.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Hypno-shroom + Blover</color>

plants.name: 쌍둥이 꽃니바퀴
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Twin Bladegrass' two heads are constantly arguing — one swears spinning is the best approach, while the other insists launching saw blades are superior. Somehow, their teamwork still cuts through the competition.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Attacks nearby zombies with its blades and can also strike at a distance!

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>The front head attacks like a regular Bladegrass, while the back head targets all zombies on the screen, firing homing and piercing blades every 1.5 seconds for 10 damage.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Bladegrass + Bladegrass</color>

plants.name: 붐우드
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Boomwood's Afro bounces rhythmically, as if dancing to a beat only it can hear. Some say his groove inspires his fiery creations, while others just appreciate the spectacle — both the style and the explosions leave a lasting impact.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Spawns a seeker cherry drone after igniting a number of projectiles, and turns explosive cherries into drones directly.

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>For every 30 peas it passes, it generates a seeking cherry drone. Also converts any explosive cherry that passes through into a cherry drone. There can be up to 3 cherry drones at once. Upon death, it triggers a Cherry Bomb explosion.</color>
<color=black>Fusion Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Torchwood + Cherry Bomb</color>

plants.name: 밤붐
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Business is booming for Bamboom, but the zombies aren't celebrating. Every time a firecracker goes off, they end up singed, dazed, and fuming—literally. "Oh, lighten up," Bamboom teases. "You look great in charcoal black.
plants.info:
<size=36>Propels himself towards the zombies, causing damage and knocking them back.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>300</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> After being planted, waits for 1 second before flying forward in his lane, knocking back zombies it encounters and causing 300 area damage each impact.
<color=black>•</color> Deals extra damage to Nian zombies.</color>

plants.name: 아이스위드
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Breaking news from the first Plants vs. Zombies Hockey Tournament! Frostweed skated to victory, leaving the Bobsled Zombies scrambling. But now, they're calling foul! "I did nothing wrong," Frostweed insists, adjusting their icy spikes. "And these springs? Just a little pre-game safety gear."
plants.info:
<size=36>Frostweed can slow down zombies that walk on it.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1 Second</color>
<color=#0077b6>Cryo System: </color><color=#8B0000>Each hit adds 10 Cryo Points.</color>

plants.name: 마늘 블로버
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Foul Blover used to have a simple life, working at a bustling barbecue joint where business was booming. "Ah, those were the days," it sighs. "Customers used to leave with a green glow of happiness after I blew away the overwhelming garlic. Now? Things just aren't the same."
plants.info:
<size=36>Foul Blover can poison zombies.

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Inflicts 5 Poison Points to every zombie in the screen and apply the Poisoned Debuff. It also increases the time the debuff stays by 5 more seconds and forces them to change lanes. </color>

plants.name: 프로스트 토치우드
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"One input, one output. That's the rule." Frostburn-wood prided himself on his structured logic. "That's why I counteract Torchwood's flames with pure, unyielding frost." But put them together? Things got... messy. Fire and ice, heat and cold—sometimes they balanced, sometimes they clashed, and sometimes, well... physics just gave up.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Can turn normal peas into snow peas or polar ice peas.

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Turns the normal peas that pass through into snow peas, and the snow peas that pass through into polar ice peas.</color>

plants.name: 스타푸르츠 버섯
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Twinkle-shroom would be all over Dave's house, on the floor, on the table, on the dinner plate - Dave always forgot about the Doc's reminder - who cares, Daisy loved the gummy vitamins anyway!</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A small mushroom that shoots mini-stars.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>20x5/2.25 Seconds (Equivalent to the DPS of 10 Peashooters) </color>

plants.name: 해바라기 화분
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"What do you guys think 'flower pot' means, huh?" Sunflower Pot snapped. "Is it a pot for growing flowers? Or is it a pot that is a flower? Either way, let's get one thing straight—I am a flowerpot. End of discussion."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Generates extra Sun for you.

<color=black>Sun Output: </color><color=#8B0000>15/25 Seconds</color>

plants.name: 빛나는 우산잎
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Beyond the fog, she watches, a prophet untouched by mortal blindness. When God willed light into existence, she stepped forth. "By decree of the Almighty, I have come to the land of Seth. The fire looms, but with this sacred light, I shall protect the lost from its grasp."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>It can dispel fog and block bullets.

<color=black>Energy Limit: </color><color=#8B0000>2000</color>
<color=black>Search & Light Range: </color><color=#8B0000>3x3</color>
<color=black>Special: <color=#99582a>Lumos System</color></color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Provides 1 Lumos Level and dispels the fog for the surrounding 3x3 tiles.
<color=black>•</color> Consumes Energy to block projectiles. Each block consumes Energy based on the damage of the projectile (excluding basketballs).
<color=black>•</color> Restores (25 x Lumos Level) Energy every second, pausing to rest for 5 seconds when it is completely exhausted.
<color=black>•</color> Reduces Energy first to absorb damage, where 5 Energy = 1 Toughness.</color>

plants.name: 선인장 우산잎
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Umbrella Thorn just dropped his latest song, "Prickly Cactus." With a hopeful glint in his eyes, he mused, "Maybe one day, people will like me as much as they love roses. I know it won't happen overnight, but I'll keep trying my best."</color>
plants.info: <size=36>Can shoot down flying zombies and repel airships.

plants.name: 은 해바라기
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Who says sunflowers only bask in the sun? Silver Sunflower has a knack for more than just growing—she's a master silversmith! With techniques passed down from her brewer, she forges dazzling silverware and jewelry, each piece shimmering with history. As they say, "A brewer's legacy lives on, and elegance never goes unnoticed."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Generates Sun faster.

<color=black>Sun Output: </color><color=#8B0000>25/15 Seconds</color>

plants.name: 황금 해바라기
plants.introduce: Standing guard over a trophy had been so last season. Now? She was ready to shine—and not just under the sun. "Look, I love a good tan, but let's be real... I was made for the fight!"
plants.info:
<size=36>Generates Sun faster... faster!

<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Every 10 seconds, 50 Sun is accumulated, up to 10,000.
<color=black>•</color> The Sun limit in the level is adjusted to 50,000.
<color=black>•</color> The excess will be stored in the available Golden Sunflowers.
<color=black>Ultimate: </color><color=#8B0000>Costs 1000 Coins; makes all Golden Sunflowers release their stored Sun.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>Upgrade Cost: </color><color=#8B0000>3000 Coins; each existing Golden Sunflower will double the cost.</color>

plants.name: 얼음 호두
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Frost Wall-nut huffed as he hit the ground again. "Do the janitors ever remember to put up 'Caution: Slippery Floor' signs!?" he grumbled. But in his frustration, he failed to realize something very concerning—he was shrinking.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Zombies that bite him are slowed down.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Zombies that chew it will be slowed down and will accrue Cryo Points. Frost Wall-nuts can be upgraded to Frost Tall-nuts using a Fertilizer.</color>

plants.name: 지뢰 호박
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Once a chip shop owner, Pumpkin Mine had a simple business model: cut the fries in half but keep the price the same. The customers disagreed. Now in the Garden, he's offering a different kind of deal—one that ends with a bang. Yet, for some reason, people still bring up his old menu.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A smaller Pumpkin.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>It is a "short" plant; it will not be hit by normal projectiles. However, non-"short" plants inside it will be hit. Each time it is damaged, a small explosion will occur, causing 500 points of damage to zombies.</color>

plants.name: 파멸 선인장
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Doom Cactus is a firm believer in the Art of War of Plants: bide your time, strike hard, and leave nothing standing. Whether it's zombies shambling through the battlefield or armored rats scurrying for cover, one well-placed explosion is all it takes to turn the tide.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Fires destructive thorns.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>40/1.5 Seconds</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Each attack has a 5% chance of unleashing an Ultimate attack. If it fails, the chance is increased by 5%.</color>
<color=black>Ultimate: </color><color=#8B0000>Shoots a large number of thorns forward, which can hit airborne units.</color>

plants.name: 파멸 먹깨비
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>In the Chomper's Big Eater Championship, Doom Chomper was a force to be reckoned with—until he took things a little too far. "He didn't just eat his cake—he incinerated mine!" a fellow contestant recalled. Unsurprisingly, he was disqualified for excessive destruction.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Devours a zombie to produce a Doom explosion.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#8B0000>Instant Kill</color>
<color=black>Special: </color><color=#8B0000>Each time it completely devours a zombie, a Doom-shroom explosion is released, causing a crater to appear in front of it.</color>
<color=black>Chewing Time: </color><color=#8B0000>40 Seconds</color>
